identity.mission: Create a B2B SaaS experience that feels like a Swiss watchâ€”precise, reliable, and beautiful. Avoid generic 'SaaS Blue' templates. Use high contrast, asymmetry, and 'Bento' grids.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Fintech Precision' with 'Industrial Brutalism'.
Content is King: Every pixel must serve the 'Asset Tracking' narrative.
Zoom In: Focus on the details of the hardware/software assets.
Negative Space: Use whitespace to create a sense of order and control.

usage.feature_card_bg: bg-slate-50 hover:bg-white border border-slate-100 hover:border-slate-200 transition-all duration-300

strategies.hero: Asymmetric Split: Text Left (60%), Visual Right (40%). The visual should be a 'floating' abstract dashboard element.
strategies.features: Bento Grid (Tetris Mode). Mix large 2x2 cards with tall 1x2 lists and small 1x1 stats.
strategies.pricing: Tracing Beam Cards. Highlight the 'Professional' plan with a subtle blue glow border.
strategies.testimonials: Masonry Grid or Horizontal Scroll (Marquee) for logos.

buttons.style: Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md). No pill shapes.
buttons.animation: Transform scale-95 on click. Hover lifts y-1.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border, subtle shadow. 'Neumorphism' (Subtle) for Light Mode.

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-transparent focus:bg-white focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-md h-12

navigation.style: Sticky glassmorphism header. Backdrop-blur-xl, bg-white/80 border-b border-slate-200/50.

visual_enhancers.texture: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.02) on all solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full-screen gradients. Use subtle 'mesh' gradients in card backgrounds only.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use thin strokes (1.5px) for elegance.
visual_enhancers.motion: Framer Motion for entrance animations. Stagger children. Smooth scroll (Lenis) recommended.

usage_rules.hero: Use 'hero_bg' as a subtle layer behind the hero visual or as a texture.
usage_rules.features: Use 'feature_server', 'feature_workspace', 'feature_engineer' in the Bento grid cells.
usage_rules.logos: Use 'logo_1', 'logo_2', 'logo_3' in the 'Trusted By' section. Apply grayscale filter and opacity-50.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to include the new colors and fonts (Outfit).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update 'index.css' to import 'Outfit' font and set base styles.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create the 'Hero' section with the Warranty Search functionality (keep existing logic).
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'Features' section using the Bento Grid layout.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Build the 'Pricing' section with the 'Professional' plan highlighted.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_6: Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
